top_comments_top.body: Why do people say it has sexualized children? Never heard of the game before

I've been playing this game for about a year, have spent $10 and it got me no where lol

With that said, I have no issues progressing through the game as a F2P player on 2 accounts and only struggle with Abyss and some of the really challenging events that pop up. Content releases, new characters, and events are more than enough to keep the casual player busy (I have time to play 1-2 hours a few days a week).

I truly love this game and think it's really special. I've tried to convince some of my hardcore gamer friends to play and they all call it a slot machine and a grind.... These are some of the same people that have been playing WOW for like 10 years, didn't mind paying for the games and expansions, monthly fees, etc. It blowsy mind.
